VoiceList.Entry: “Haa--ah! Gotcha! And you deserve it,too!”
Barret “Hey,we been had! And…my money!”
Tifa “Hey! My money!”
Aeris “Hmm…Hey,don't we have less money than before?”
Red XIII “… Some money is missing.”
Red XIII “Hey! My emergency money!”
Cait Sith “Gil,gil,gil,where's my gil!?”
Cid “What the--!? Gone! My money's gone!”
Vincent “Hmm? Pretty fast.”
Barret “&^%$!! Gimme back my money!!”
Tifa “Wait a second! Where's my money!?”
Aeris “Geez! You shouldn't have done that!!”
Red XIII “Greed…A perfect example of human nature.”
Red XIII “Give…give back what is rightfully mine!”
Cait Sith “Hey,you can't! My gil,give it back!”
Cid “Steal MY money,will ya? You got a lot of #&^%$ nerve!!”
“Just remember who you're dealin' with,punk!!”
Vincent “The gil doesn't seem be her real objective…”
Barret “Wassup with that broad?”
Tifa “Cloud,do you know her?”
Aeris “Who is that girl?”
Red XIII “You don't see one like that everyday…”
Red XIII “Who is that girl? She's still a child.”
Cait Sith “Who do you think she is? I don't recognize her face.”
Cid “Who is that kid?”
Vincent “She has a mysterious weapon. I've seen her somewhere before…”
“Man… I can't believe I lost.”
“You spikey-headed jerk! One more time,let's go one more time!” All right Not interested
“Hey,boobs! Try that again! Just one more time!“ What did you say!? Don't fight
“Hey,you bow-legged ol' man! Give me another chance! I'll fight ya!” Give her a lickin' Forget it!
“I won't lose this time! Take your time and get ready. Holler when you're ready!”
“No way I'm going to fight with a punk like you more than once!”
“I'll save enough for the doctor bill! Next time,you won't be as lucky!”
“Thinkin' of running away? Stay and fight! FIGHT,I said!”
“C'mon… What's the matter?”
“You're pretty scared of me, huh!?” Petrified… You're gonna lose again
“C'mon… What's the matter?”
“You're pretty scared of me, huh!?” Petrified… You're outta your league!
“C'mon… What's the matter?”
“You're pretty scared of me, huh!?” Something like that You're wasting your time
“Wh…what!?”
“Uuuuugh! Now I'm really mad!”
“Make fun of me,will ya! Just watch!!”
“Hmm,just as I thought. What do you expect with my skills?”
“Good luck to you guys,too. If you feel up to it, we can go another around. Later!”
Tifa “She's gone… What's with her?”
Barret “Gone… Wassup with that?”
Aeris “She's gone… So what was that all about?”
Red XIII “She's gone… So what did that prove?”
Red XIII “Huh? She's gone… What is she doing?”
Cait Sith “…She disappeared… I have no clue what happened.”
Cid “She's gone,hey… What's with that kid!?”
Vincent “… What could her motivation have been?”
“What is it,you still have somethin' for me?”
“…Hmmm. So is that it?”
“I know you want my help because I'm so good!”
“You want me to go with you?” That's right You kiddin'?
“What,you still want somethin'?”
“Hmm… So is that it?”
“You want my help 'cause I'm so good!”
“You want me to go with you!? Is that what you're saying?” That's right No way!
“What is it, you still want somethin'?”
“…Hmm. So is that it?”
“You want my help 'cause I'm so good!”
“So you want me to come with you!? Is that what you're saying?” That's right What're you sayin'?”
“I'm gonna leave! I mean it!” Go ahead Wait a second!
“I'm really gonna leave! I mean it!” Yeah,so? Wait a second!
“I'm really gonna leave! I mean it!” GO,then! Hold on!
“Oh yeah? Then do whatever you want!”
“Heh heh…thought so. You put me in a spot. Hmm,what should I do?”
“But,if you want me that bad, I can't refuse…”
“All right! I'll go with you!” What's your name? Let's hurry
“Heh heh…thought so. You put me in a spot. Hmm,what should I do?”
“But,if you want me that bad, I can't refuse…”
“All right! I'll go with you!” What's your name? Come on,let's hurry!”
“Heh heh…thought so. You put me in a spot. Hmm,what should I do?”
“But,if you want me that bad, I can't refuse…”
“All right! I'll go with you!” What's your name? Come on,or we'll leave you!
“Me? The name's…”
“What are you talking about!? You're the one who should go first!”
“Okay forget it! I'm not going with you!”
“Remember,if you piss me off it'll cost you!!”
“Huh? Hey…HEY!”
“Wait! I haven't even told you my name…”
Yuffie “I'm Yuffie! Good to meetcha!”
Yuffie “Heh,heh…just as I planned.”
“Now all I have to do is… a little this and a little that… nyuk,nyuk,nyuk…”
Yuffie “Hey,wait up! Wait for me!!”
Yuffie “Here,I'll give you back the money I've stolen from you!”
“…Or,uh,what's left of it.”
